name: shukuchi
description: Shukuchi is an Obsidian plugin that enables you to teleport to links (URL or internal link).

scripts.ci: bun install && bun run build && bun run test
scripts.release: bun ci && bun version-bump.mts ${VERSION} && git add package.json manifest-beta.json manifest.json versions.json bun.lockb && git commit -m ${VERSION} && git tag ${VERSION} && git push --tags && git push

author: tadashi-aikawa
